name: akshata_patel
text:
Good afternoon team,
QQ: any quick way to get the runtime(in secs) of a pipeline - both in case of success and failure?

replies.name: ian_whalen
replies.text: This hook example might be useful to you: <https://docs.kedro.org/en/stable/hooks/examples.html#add-observability-to-your-pipeline>
